name: Dark Scratch Editor
description: Want to code with Scratch, but the editor is too bright? This style applies a dark theme to the online Scratch (3) editor so you can code in peace. There are also many fun settings to play around with!

additional_info: I also recommend installing Eribetra's userstyle to darken other parts of the website here: https://userstyles.org/styles/173170/dark-theme-for-scratch INSTALL GUIDE: Install the Stylus extension for your favorite browser and click the install button on this page to get the style. SET YOUR OWN CUSTOM BACKGROUND IMAGE (NEW!) Click on the settings next to the install button to set your own background image! GITHUB Since this update, you can find the Github source code here! Releases (dd-mm-yyyy): 12-04-2022 || 3.0.0 > Finally, another update! There are many improvements to the UI and a new theme to try out (aquarium).
